university.name: Università degli Studi di Firenze

campuses.notes: Main campus with multiple locations across Florence

university.notes: 148 degree programs: 64 bachelor, 9 ciclo unico, 75 master. 21 international programs, 18 English-taught. 7 blended programs.

admissions.notes: Immatricolazioni dal 1° luglio per accesso libero. Corsi a numero programmato hanno scadenze specifiche.

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: Fees paid in two installments. Regional tax + stamp in first rate.
tuition.notes: No tax area €24,000 (above national €22K). Living costs 700-900 EUR/month in Florence.

scholarships.description: Regional scholarship for students with low ISEE covering tuition, accommodation, meals
scholarships.notes: ARDSU Toscana manages regional scholarships for all Tuscan universities.
